mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(vc_userid, vc_name, f_age, vc_sex, vc_phone, vc_address) values(#{userid}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: update sys_user set vc_name = #{name}, f_age = #{age}, vc_sex = #{sex}, vc_phone = #{phone}, vc_addresse = #{address}, d_update = #{updatetime} where vc_userid = #{userid}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.f_id id, t.vc_userid userid, t.vc_name name, t.f_age age, t.vc_sex sex, t.vc_phone phone, t.vc_address address, t.d_begin_date begindate, t.d_end_date enddate, t.d_create_date createdate, t.d_update updatetime FROM sys_user t
t.vc_name like concat('%', #{ name }, '%')
and t.vc_phone like concat('%', #{ phone }, '%')
order by t.f_id desc
select * from admin where vc_username = #{username} and vc_password = #{password}
